Description: Sunny & Spacious apartment in Brownstone in the Heart of Cleveland Circle with 3 Large bedroom. Unit features High Ceilings, Hardwood Floors, Large living room, Office and an eat-in kitchen. Coin-Op laundry in the basement. Fantastic location with with easy access to the T Greenline B, C & D as well as all the restaurants, stores and nightlife. Heat and hot water included in the rent. On-street parking with a residential permit. Cat friendly for $50/month. Dogs are considered on a case by case basis for an additional $100/month upon landlord's approval. Available Immediately Lease until Aug 31, 2024 First & Last Month required Heat & Hot Water included One month Brokers Fee
